Title: The site of the first general meeting of the Chinese Communist Party
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The house on Huangpi Road in Shanghai, where the first National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party was opened secretly in 1921.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Shanghai, Poster City
Tags: Museum of the First National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党第一次全国代表大会会址
National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
